titles: England's improvements justified; and the author thereof, Captain Y. vindicated from the scandals in a paper called a Coffee-house dialogue. With some animadversions upon his popish designs therein contained.

notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
